title: Troy Aikman Does It All
description:
Adam starts off today's episode with another brutal travel story and how he shadowed his daughter at work for the day. After that, Adam gets into some of the biggest storylines coming off Week 17 heading into Week 18 before we sit down with Troy Aikman. Adam and Troy talk about everything from life outside of football, John Madden and his impact, owning an NFL team one day, and more!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
